content: ä»£ç  /** * Author: ShacozzZ * Created: 2021-08-25 21:23:21 **/ #include<algorithm>#include<iostream>#include<map>#include<queue>#include<vector>using namespace std; #define endl '\n' #define x first #define y second typedef long long ll; typedef pair<int,int> P; const int inf=0x3f3f3f3f; const int maxn=1e5+5; int n,m; struct edge{ int v,w; edge(){} edge(int vv,int ww){v=vv;w=ww;} }; struct node{ int x,y,z; node(){} node(int xx,int yy,int zz){x=xx;y=yy;z=zz;} bool operator>(const node &b)const{return x>b.x;} }; vector<edge> g[maxn]; int st,en,dis1[maxn],dis2[maxn],cnt1[maxn],cnt2[maxn]; void init(){ for(int i=0;i<=n;i++){ g[i].clear(); dis1[i]=dis2[i]=inf; cnt1[i]=cnt2[i]=0; } } void dij(){ priority_queue<node,vector<node>,greater<node>> q; dis1[st]=0; cnt1[st]=1; q.push(node(0,st,1)); while(!q.empty()){ node p=q.top(); q.pop(); int u=p.y; int d=p.x; int num=(p.z==1?cnt1[u]:cnt2[u]); if(p.z==1&&dis1[u]<p.x)continue; if(p.z==2&&dis2[u]<p.x)continue; for(int i=0;i<g[u].size();i++){ int v=g[u][i].v,w=g[u][i].w; if(d+w<dis1[v]){ dis2[v]=dis1[v]; cnt2[v]=cnt1[v]; q.push(node(dis2[v],v,2)); dis1[v]=d+w; cnt1[v]=num; q.push(node(dis1[v],v,1)); }else if(d+w==dis1[v])cnt1[v]+=num; else if(d+w<dis2[v]){ dis2[v]=d+w; cnt2[v]=num; q.push(node(dis2[v],v,2)); }else if(d+w==dis2[v])cnt2[v]+=num; } } } inline void solve(){ cin>>n>>m; int u,v,w; init(); for(int i=0;i<m;i++){ cin>>u>>v>>w; g[u].push_back(edge(v,w)); } cin>>st>>en; dij(); cout<<(dis2[en]-dis1[en]==1?cnt1[en]+cnt2[en]:cnt1[en])<<endl; } int main(){ ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(0); int __=1; cin>>__; while(__--){ solve(); } return 0; }
